Warning:\nThis application is protected by copyright law and international treaties.\nUnauthorized reproduction or distribution of this application, or any portion of it, may result in severe civil and criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law.
The RADWIN WINTouch app is an innovative and easy-to-use tool to simplify the installation and management of RADWIN Subscriber Units.\n\n WINTouch enables the automatic selection of the best available Base Station, optimal antenna alignment and link quality verification.\n\n Making the antenna alignment process so easy that no prior skill-set is required, WINTouch guarantees rapid alignment and commissioning, secures the best connection and optimizes service performance at every site installation.\n\n WINTouch assists the field technician by improving daily task management - overseeing installation assignments and prioritizing scheduled tasks based on installation site proximity.\n\n In addition, installation status and deployment analysis reports are automatically generated for quick and easy distribution to colleagues and peers.\n\n WINTouch also provides access to training sessions, product documentation and update notifications.\n\n When using the WINTouch app with your RADWIN wireless broadband solution, you will be surprised by how simple and quick the installation process becomes and how it will boost your operational efficiency!\n\n

Restarting device please wait Connecting to device: Connect now "Connecting to device" Warning Work order status will change to In Progress Nearest Site Return to workorders Connectivity Lost Waiting for Data Connectivity Lost - Cannot continue Your device might not contain the latest version \nPlease upgrade it Could not connect Try Again Device is not connected to correct network \nPlease check network SSID Serial length must be exactly 16 characters SSID must contain A-Z, 0-9 characters The SU cannot be re-aligned, as it is under service This SU is registered and will be de-registered for re-alignment - would you like to procced? 1. Mount the Subscriber Unit on a pole or wall, using the supplied mounting kit.\n\n2. Ground the Subscriber Unit.\n\n3. Connect one end of the CAT5e cable to the Subscriber Unit via a Lightning Protection Unit (LPU).\n\n4. Connect the other end of the CAT5e cable to a PoE via a second LPU.\n\n5. Connect power and Ethernet cable to the PoE; the Subscriber Unit is now powered on. 1. Run WINTouch application installed on your smartphone\n\n2. Choose the Projects pull-down menu\n\n3. Choose the project on which you are working or create a new one\n\n4. Choose work order or create a new one\n\n5. Press the START ALIGNMENT button and follow the WINTouch instructions Subscriber Unit Physical Installation
Wintouch will send an SMS message to verify your phone number. \n Enter your name, Counry code and Phone number: Email Please attach at least one picture to the report cannot use phone ? Please input the Pin Code Recieved in the SMS message sent to: 050-880-4277 To complete alignment, turn off the Smart network switch option, found in the Wi-Fi settings.
